scripts.docker_rebuild: npm run docker_compose_pull && npm run docker_compose_build && npm run docker_compose_kill && npm run docker_compose_down && npm run docker_compose_up
scripts.gitUpdate: git pull && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push
scripts.docker_prune: docker kill $(docker ps -qa) || true && docker system prune
scripts.reset_volume: sudo rm -rf volumes && mkdir -p volumes && touch volumes/.gitkeep
